caption.p: Distribution of H 2S, organic acid, diffusible pigment and various enzymes producing isolates in near-root soils of twenty plant communities on the Tibetan Plateau. (The size of the bubble indicates the proportion of organic acid, H 2S, diffusible pigment and various enzymes producing isolates to the total isolates, respectively). Al (L), Astragalus licentianus Hand.-Mazz. at 2800 m, Al (H), Astragalus licentianus Hand.-Mazz. at 4200.
